subtitle: Get personalized financial coaching through AI-powered conversation. Your intelligent finance coach is ready to help you make smarter money decisions.

step1.title: Send your expense via WhatsApp
step1.description: Simply message "Spent $50 at supermarket" and Bilio records it automatically.

step2.title: AI categorizes automatically
step2.description: Bilio identifies your expense category and suggests budget optimizations.

step3.title: View insights on your dashboard
step3.description: Get detailed reports, alerts and personalized advice to improve your finances.
